sentences: Vaidlusalustes küsimustes ei suudetud veel i-le punkti peale panna.
context: The Estonian word 'punkti' is the illative or partitive singular form of 'punkt'. As shown in the dictionary definition, it can mean 'to put something to an end/point' or be used grammatically as the accusative case marker for the word 'punkt'. In sentences, it often appears with verbs indicating completion or finality, such as when putting a point on something or finishing a task.
